column2: an A.M. Eatery////This place was worth the wait! We ordered the The Breakfast Pot Pie
column3: Corned Beef Haag and Snooze Breakfast Burrito
column4: plus the secret Cinnamon Roll Pancake (not on the menu). Big portions and super tasty! We still had food left over! Our server
column5: John was kind and attentive and funny. Definitely will be back!!
